mapper.select: SELECT b.blog_id,b.title,b.content_id,b.description,b.browse,b.create_time,t.name,t.tag_id FROM witter.Blog AS b LEFT JOIN witter.tag_map AS tm ON tm.href=b.blog_id AND tm.type=1 AND tm.status=0 LEFT JOIN witter.tag AS t ON tm.tag_id=t.tag_id WHERE b.create_time <= #{createTime} AND b.status=0 ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}

SELECT b.blog_id,b.title,b.content_id,b.description,b.browse,b.create_time,t.name,t.tag_id,bc.content FROM witter.Blog AS b LEFT JOIN witter.tag_map AS tm ON tm.href=b.blog_id AND tm.type=1 AND tm.status=0 LEFT JOIN witter.tag AS t ON tm.tag_id=t.tag_id LEFT JOIN witter.blog_content AS bc ON b.content_id=bc.content_id WHERE b.blog_id=#{blogId} AND b.status=0
SELECT content from witter.blog_content AS c ,witter.blog AS b WHERE b.blog_id=#{blogId} AND b.content_id=c.content_id
mapper.update: UPDATE witter.blog SET browse=browse+1 WHERE blog_id=#{blogId}
UPDATE witter.blog SET status=1 WHERE blog_id=#{blogId}
